name: Elizabeth Borden
description: Elizabeth Borden,also known asLizorLizzie, was a character in theCyberpunkuniverse. Liz Borden was the name given to a slightly psychotic joygirl working in theUptown Mallwith one of the smallergangsinNight City. In her her more lucid moments, Liz was a good source of information. In the2060s, Lizzie was the owner of astrip clubinKabuki. She was known for treating her workers fairly and defending them from violent clients. On May 132067,one of Lizzie's girls was brutally raped and murdered by members of theTyger Clawsgang. Lizzie avenged her by killing three of the assailants with an axe and...
